arts.ttl: Lyon loses to Nice and misses chance to top Ligue 1
arts.sum: The visitor quickly fell behind when Nice defender Melvin Bard connected with a fine cross by Sofiane Diop in the fifth minute. Nice, however, made the most of its rare chances and regained the lead five minutes later as Diop turned from provider to scorer with a fine finish from a tight angle.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | OGC Nice 3-2 Lyon: Melvin Bard nets against former club as OL slump to back-to-back defeats
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Matchday 8, 18/10/25 OGC Nice inflicted a second consecutive defeat on Olympique Lyonnais (3-2), who, having not conceded with 10 men on the pitch prior to the…

arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v OGC Nice: Tanner Tessmann could be rested
arts.sum: Having returned late from international duty, Tanner Tessmann could be rested from Olympique Lyonnais’ visit to face OGC Nice on Saturday afternoon. Tessmann featured for the USMNT in Denver on…

arts.ttl: OGC Nice predicted XI v Lyon: Kevin Carlos to start in Terem Moffi’s absence
arts.sum: As revealed by Franck Haise, Terem Moffi suffered a muscular injury during Thursday’s training session and is set to miss several weeks of action. It leaves Kevin Carlos, who has…
